aboutMe: my name is Atikah. I am an enthusiastic web developer and an aspiring designer.
My passion widely range from web design and graphic design to arts and crafts to furniture and interior designs.
Yeah, that's pretty overambitious. However, part of the fun lies in the learning process and I'm all up for it!

projects.title: Eat in Dice
projects.desc: A random recipe generator created by using themealdb api. This was made for my sister to encourage her to cook instead of buying takeouts.

projects.title: Today's Menu
projects.desc: An app where the user can add or delete dishes and choose dishes to display on today's menu.
